column2: ERROR_LOGIN_NOACTIVITY_NOPRIVILEGES,"You havent login or your session had expired because of inactivity"

column3: ADMIN_PANEL_MAIN_reservation_text,"Find all reservations that your clients have done here. You can also change its status, block, send messages and more."
ADMIN_PANEL_MAIN_client_text,"This is where you will find almost everything you need to know about any client. You can also change his personal data, address information, change password and more."
ADMIN_PANEL_MAIN_rooms_text,"If for some reason you have to block rooms (like maintainance), use this section."
ADMIN_PANEL_MAIN_messages_text,"Read/Respond your client's private messages. Remmember that all this messages are also sent to your email account: "
ADMIN_PANEL_MAIN_print_text,"Create client's address prints for your letters in seconds. You can also delete them."
ADMIN_PANEL_RESERVATIONS_nothing_found,"No reservations has been found in database!"
ADMIN_PANEL_RESERVATIONS_nothing_found_client,"No reservations has been found in database for this client!"
RESERVATION_STATUS_cancel_introtext,"If you want to cancel this reservation, we recommend you to write some comment to this client explaining the reasons why the reservation was cancelled."
RESERVATION_STATUS_cancel_tooltip_text,"When you cancel a reservation, the room / week are free to being reserved by other user."
RESERVATION_STATUS_restore_introtext,"Remmember that you can only restore a cancelled reservation if the rooms has not been reserved by other user."
RESERVATION_STATUS_restore_tooltip_text,"We recommend you to call your client to tell him that this reservation has been restored."
RESERVATION_BLOCK_cancel_introtext,"If you want to block this reservation, we recommend you to write some comment to this client explaining the reasons why the reservation was blocked."
RESERVATION_BLOCK_cancel_tooltip_text,"When you block a reservation, the room / week are 'hidden' to your clients, so, this rooms cannot be reserved by anyone."
RESERVATION_BLOCK_restore_introtext,"Remmember that this room / week are hidden, so, nobody can reserve it. Consider that you could be losing money with hidden rooms."
RESERVATION_BLOCK_restore_tooltip_text,"We recommend you to call your client to tell him that this reservation has been unblocked."
ROOM_BLOCK_question,"Do you really want to block this room ?"
ROOM_BLOCK_last_warning,"If you block a room, your clients will not be able to reserve it."
ROOM_unBLOCK_question,"Are you sure you want to unblock this room ?"
ROOM_unBLOCK_last_warning,"If you restore this room, your clients will be now able to reserve it."

column2: ADMIN_PANEL_CLIENTS_LISTADO_filter_noresults,"Nothing found for this filter. Please try another"

column3: ADMIN_PANEL_CLIENTS_EDIT_error,"Nothing saved! please check the form and try again"
ADMIN_PANEL_CLIENTS_EDIT_error_no_client,"You have to choose a client to edit"
ADMIN_PANEL_PASSWORD_text_1,"You are about to change the password for this client."
ADMIN_PANEL_PASSWORD_text_2,"Remmember that this client wont get access to his account, until you send the new password."
ADMIN_PANEL_PASSWORD_error,"The password wasn't changed! please check the form and try again"
ADMIN_PANEL_PASSWORD_ok,"Client's password has been changed. Dont forget to send it to your client."
MSG_ADD_COMMENT_text_1,"Get more information about this reservation or just answer your client's questions for this reservation in particular."
MSG_ADD_COMMENT_text_2,"If you have to block or cancel this reservation, we really recomend you to explain your client the reason of this."
MSG_QUESTIONS,"No questions has been found in database!"
MSG_NOMESSAGES_FOUND,"No messages has been found in database!"

column2: ADMIN_PANEL_PRINT_pdf_title,"This prints has been created recently"

ADMIN_PANEL_PRINT_pdf_missed_actions,"Some necesary params are missed! Close this window and try again.
If the problem persist, please contact us."
